name: Anthony Davidson
introduction: Anthony Davidson (born April 18, 1979 in Hemel Hempstead, Hertfordshire, England, United Kingdom) is a former British Formula One driver who participated in F1 from 2002 until 2008 for the Minardi, BAR and Super Aguri teams. Since 2008 Davidson has test with both the Brawn and Mercedes teams. However since 2009, Davidson has been further recognized as a Commentator for the BBC Radio 5 Live commentary team alongside David Croft before moving to the Sky Sports F1 HD commentary team in 2012.
